executive_summary.key_decision: FjordHQ adopts McKinsey, BCG, Bain (MBB) corporate communication standards across all strategic documents and evidence artifacts
executive_summary.rationale: CEO spends 2-3 hours/week parsing reports. MBB standards reduce parsing time to <1 hour/week while improving decision quality (Economic Freedom = Alpha / Tidsbruk optimization)

impact.evidence_quality: Every claim backed by verifiable evidence chain

executive_summary.risk: LOW - Standards enhance existing processes, no breaking changes

pyramid_principle.definition: Start with the answer, then support with evidence (Barbara Minto)
pyramid_principle.benefit: CEO grasps key findings in <5 minutes per report
pyramid_principle.implementation: All strategic documents restructured with executive_summary first

mece_framework.definition: Mutually Exclusive, Collectively Exhaustive - no overlap, no gaps
mece_framework.example: Regret Categories: Type A (hysteresis), Type B (confidence), Type C (data), Type X (unknown)

evidence_based_decision_making.definition: Every claim backed by verifiable data with court-proof evidence chain
evidence_based_decision_making.implementation: Existing stig_court_proof_enforcer.py enhanced with MBB structure

structured_problem_solving.definition: Issue tree decomposition - complex problems into hierarchical decision trees
structured_problem_solving.example: Problem: 16.1% regret → Hypothesis tree (Type A/B/C) → Confirmed: Type A → Surgical fix
structured_problem_solving.benefit: Clear root cause identification, focused solutions
structured_problem_solving.implementation: All strategic analyses follow hypothesis tree structure

so_what_test.definition: Every data point answers 'So What? Why does this matter?'
so_what_test.example: NOT: 'Beliefs arrive every 2.4 min' BUT: 'Beliefs every 2.4 min (SO WHAT: 88-min orchestrator creates 60-80 min latency gap)'

80_20_rule.definition: Focus on 20% of factors that drive 80% of impact (Pareto Principle)
80_20_rule.example: Type A regret = 100% of cases = focus all effort here, ignore Type B/C (0% cases)

deliverables: Update all CEO-facing reports to pyramid structure
Apply MECE framework to all categorical analysis
Add 'So What?' statements to all data points
Update evidence artifact templates with pyramid structure
Add executive summary to all evidence JSON files
MBB standards training for all agents (LARS, FINN, CSEO, etc.)
CEO feedback loop (clarity, decision velocity metrics)

mbb_compliance_checker.purpose: Validate reports against MBB corporate standards
checks: mece_compliance: No overlap, no gaps in categories
evidence_chain: Every claim has evidence ID
so_what_coverage: Data points have impact statements (>90%)

serper_mbb_wrapper.purpose: Wrap Serper Google Search API with MBB-structured output

mbb_evidence_formatter.purpose: Format evidence artifacts following MBB pyramid principle

serper_integration_verification.test_query: Federal Reserve interest rate decision latest

primary_metrics.measurement: Executive summary present in all strategic docs

quality_gates.g1_self_review: Agent validates own output against MBB checklist
quality_gates.g2_peer_review: STIG reviews FINN reports for MBB compliance
quality_gates.g3_vega_audit: Quarterly MBB compliance audit, clarity score > 8/10 required
quality_gates.g4_ceo_approval: CEO provides clarity feedback on strategic reports

adr_compliance: ADR-018: Agent State Reliability Protocol (court-proof evidence)

numerator_optimization.mechanism: Faster decisions via clarity → capture more alpha opportunities

economic_freedom_formula_impact.net_economic_freedom_impact: POSITIVE - Both numerator and denominator improve

bad_report_before_mbb.example: We analyzed 193 suppressions. 31 were regret. Regret rate is 16.1%. Type A was 100%. This suggests hysteresis lag is the primary cause. Therefore, we recommend adaptive confirms_required.

good_report_after_mbb.example:
RECOMMENDATION: Deploy adaptive confirms_required by Day 28.

RATIONALE: 100% of regret is Type A (hysteresis lag), not calibration or data issues. Surgical fix targets root cause with minimal risk.

EVIDENCE:
- 193 suppressions analyzed (31 regret, 161 wisdom)
- Type A: 31 (100%), Type B: 0, Type C: 0
- Avg suppressed confidence: 0.77, chosen: 0.82 (system was RIGHT)

stig_certification.statement: I, STIG (CTO), certify that ADR-023 MBB Corporate Standards Integration has been designed, documented, and deployed. Serper API integration verified. MBB compliance checker and wrapper operational. Phase 1 documentation standards ready for Day 10 deployment. All tools tested and validated. Economic Freedom Formula impact: positive (both alpha and tidsbruk improve).
